name: Short Circuit - Game Jam Version
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Jam 2020 featuring the theme "Out of control."

Unfurtunatley, this game was made in about 6 hours as opposed to the standard 72--but I wanted to submit it anyways. I loved this theme, and will be finishing and polishing up this game.

Controls:

WASD - Move

YUI - Powers

Be careful! Some of the powerups will short circuit your ship! Swapping, disabling, or constantly pressing keys!
